title: Ep. - 352 - JONATHAN KNIGHT FROM HGTV AND NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK BASEBALL PITCHER RYAN SHERRIFF
description:
Singer Jonathan Knight may be best known as a member of the Grammy-nominated band New Kids on the Block, but in the new HGTV series Farmhouse Fixer, he share his renovation know-how by meticulously restoring centuries-old New England farmhouses that deserve a second chance. He discusses becoming a member of the band, coping with anxiety once the band stopped performing, building a career in real estate development, and his new show.

 

Tampa Bay Rays relief pitcher Ryan Sherriff discusses coming forward this week in a Sports Illustrated cover story about a growing number of MLB baseball players who are speaking out about mental health issues.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
